item.title: CardboardCI
item.description: A collection of docker images for use in continuous integration. Summary A collection of docker images that provide a common core for use in continuous integration. The idea of these images is to balance the following: Frequency of updates Standard set of tooling Common Environment Background Notes I encountered a lot of difficult with trying to automate the updating of those docker images.
